com.datasift.dropwizard.config
Class GraphiteConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.config.GraphiteConfiguration

public class GraphiteConfiguration
extends Object

Configuration for a Graphite metrics reporter.

See Also:
GraphiteReporter, GraphiteReportingBundle

Field Summary
protected  boolean enabled
          Whether reporting metrics to Graphite should be enabled.
protected  com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> excludes
          The set of metrics to exclude from being reported to Graphite.
protected  Duration frequency
          The frequency to report metrics to Graphite.
protected  String host
          The hostname of the Graphite server to report metrics to.
protected  int port
          The port of the Graphite server to report metrics to.
protected  String prefix
          The prefix (if any) for key names sent to Graphite.

Field Detail

enabled

protected boolean enabled
Whether reporting metrics to Graphite should be enabled.

prefix

@NotNull
protected String prefix
The prefix (if any) for key names sent to Graphite.

host

@NotEmpty
protected String host
The hostname of the Graphite server to report metrics to.

port

@NotNull
@Range(min=0L,
       max=49151L)
protected int port
The port of the Graphite server to report metrics to.

frequency

@NotNull
protected Duration frequency
The frequency to report metrics to Graphite.

excludes

@NotNull
protected com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> excludes
The set of metrics to exclude from being reported to Graphite.

The metric is specified as its fully-qualified path in Graphite, excluding the prefix: package.class[.scope].name
